entry.title: NTK 2024
entry.content:
I will be presenting at ntk.si about Azure Arc - Hybrid and Multi-Cloud Management and Solution. The title of the presentation will be “Is Azure Arc the future of managing on-premise environments?”

Please reach out via social media or send me an old fashion email to erik.blazica@outlook.com if there is anything at all that you would like to see at the presentation. I love answering to hard questions so send me as many as you can. I am very interested in what kind of challenges are you experiencing at your company and how Azure Arc can help you solve all this challenges.

I will be adding all resources, slides, your anonymized questions (with your permission) to here so keep coming back for more.

Thank you for your interest and I am looking forward to meeting you at NTK.

Note

You can learn more about Azure Arc on Microsoft Adaptive Cloud Academy, Microsoft training, Azure Arc documentation, Arc Jumpstart.

Send me a message via email erik.blazica@outlook.com or X @erikblazica
